verses.verse: Moreover, when you shall divide <WH5307> by lot the land <WH776> for inheritance, <WH5159> you shall offer <WH7311> an oblation <WH8641> to the LORD, <WH3068> an holy <WH6944> portion of the land: <WH776> the length <WH753> shall be the length <WH753> of five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> reeds, and the breadth <WH7341> shall be ten <WH6235> thousand. <WH505> This <WH1931> shall be holy <WH6944> in all <WH3605> the borders <WH1366> thereof round <WH5439> about.

Of this <WH2088> there shall be for the sanctuary <WH6944> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> in length, with five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> in breadth, <WH7341> square <WH7251> round <WH5439> about; and fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520> round <WH5439> about for the suburbs <WH4054> thereof.

And of this <WH2063> measure <WH4060> shall you measure <WH4058> the length <WH753> of five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand, <WH505> and the breadth <WH7341> of ten <WH6235> thousand: <WH505> and in it shall be the sanctuary <WH4720> and the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place.

The holy <WH6944> portion of the land <WH776> shall be for the priests <WH3548> the ministers <WH8334> of the sanctuary, <WH4720> which shall come <WH7131> near <WH7131> to minister <WH8334> to the LORD: <WH3068> and it shall be a place <WH4725> for their houses, <WH1004> and an holy <WH4720> place for the sanctuary. <WH4720>

And the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> of length, <WH753> and the ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> of breadth <WH7341>shall also the Levites, <WH3881> the ministers <WH8334> of the house, <WH1004> have <WH1961> for themselves, <WH1992> for a possession <WH272> for twenty <WH6242> chambers. <WH3957>

And you shall appoint <WH5414> the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892> five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> broad, <WH7341> and five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> long, <WH753> over <WH5980> against <WH5980> the oblation <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> portion: it shall be for the whole <WH3605> house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

And a portion shall be for the prince <WH5387> on the one side and on the other <WH2088> side of the oblation <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> portion, and of the possession <WH272> of the city, <WH5892> before <WH413> <WH6440> the oblation <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> portion, and before <WH413> <WH6440> the possession <WH272> of the city, <WH5892> from the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> westward, <WH3220> and from the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> eastward: <WH6921> and the length <WH753> shall be over <WH5980> against <WH5980> one <WH259> of the portions, <WH2506> from the west <WH3220> border <WH1366> to the east <WH6921> border. <WH1366>

In the land <WH776> shall be his possession <WH272> in Israel: <WH3478> and my princes <WH5387> shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> oppress <WH3238> my people; <WH5971> and the rest of the land <WH776> shall they give <WH5414> to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> according to their tribes. <WH7626>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Let it suffice <WH7227> you, O princes <WH5387> of Israel: <WH3478> remove <WH5493> violence <WH2555> and spoil, <WH7701> and execute <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> and justice, <WH6666> take <WH7311> away <WH7311> your exactions <WH1646> from my people, <WH5971> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
You shall have <WH1961> just <WH6664> balances, <WH3976> and a just <WH6664> ephah, <WH374> and a just <WH6664> bath. <WH1324>

The ephah <WH374> and the bath <WH1324> shall be of one <WH259> measure, <WH8506> that the bath <WH1324> may contain <WH5375> the tenth <WH4643> part of an homer, <WH2563> and the ephah <WH374> the tenth <WH6224> part of an homer: <WH2563> the measure <WH4971> thereof shall be after the homer. <WH2563>

And the shekel <WH8255> shall be twenty <WH6242> gerahs: <WH1626> twenty <WH6242> shekels, <WH8255> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> shekels, <WH8255> fifteen <WH6235> <WH2568> shekels, <WH8255> shall be your maneh. <WH4488>

This <WH2063> is the oblation <WH8641> that you shall offer; <WH7311> the sixth <WH8345> part of an ephah <WH374> of an homer <WH2563> of wheat, <WH2406> and you shall give the sixth <WH8341> part of an ephah <WH374> of an homer <WH2563> of barley: <WH8184>

Concerning the ordinance <WH2706> of oil, <WH8081> the bath <WH1324> of oil, <WH8081> you shall offer the tenth <WH4643> part of a bath <WH1324> out of the cor, <WH3734> which <WH4480> is an homer <WH2563> of ten <WH6235> baths; <WH1324> for ten <WH6235> baths <WH1324> are an homer: <WH2563>

And one <WH259> lamb <WH7716> out of the flock, <WH6629> out of two hundred, <WH3967> out of the fat <WH4945> pastures <WH4945> of Israel; <WH3478> for a meat offering, <WH4503> and for a burnt <WH5930> offering, and for peace <WH8002> offerings, to make reconciliation <WH3722> for them, said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
All <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall give <WH1961> <WH413> this <WH2063> oblation <WH8641> for the prince <WH5387> in Israel. <WH3478>

And it shall be the prince's <WH5387> part to give burnt <WH5930> offerings, <WH4503> and meat offerings, and drink <WH5262> offerings, in the feasts, <WH2282> and in the new <WH2320> moons, <WH2320> and in the sabbaths, <WH7676> in all <WH3605> solemnities <WH4150> of the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> he shall prepare <WH3559> the sin <WH2403> offering, <WH4503> and the meat offering, and the burnt <WH5930> offering, and the peace <WH8002> offerings, to make reconciliation <WH3722> for the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> In the first <WH7223> month, in the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> you shall take <WH3947> a young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock <WH6499> without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> and cleanse <WH2398> the sanctuary: <WH4720>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818> of the sin <WH2403> offering, and put <WH5414> it on the posts <WH4201> of the house, <WH1004> and on the four <WH702> corners <WH6438> of the settle <WH5835> of the altar, <WH4196> and on the posts <WH4201> of the gate <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court. <WH2691>

And so <WH3651> you shall do <WH6213> the seventh <WH7651> day of the month <WH2320> for every <WH376> one <WH376> that errs, <WH7686> and for him that is simple: <WH6612> so shall you reconcile <WH3722> the house. <WH1004>

In the first <WH7223> month, in the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> you shall have <WH1961> the passover, <WH6453> a feast <WH2282> of seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> unleavened <WH4682> bread shall be eaten. <WH398>
And on that day <WH3117> shall the prince <WH5387> prepare <WH3559> for himself and for all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> a bullock <WH6499> for a sin <WH2403> offering.

And seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> of the feast <WH2282> he shall prepare <WH3559> a burnt <WH5930> offering to the LORD, <WH3068> seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> daily <WH3117> the seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> and a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> daily <WH3117> for a sin <WH2403> offering.
And he shall prepare <WH3559> a meat offering <WH4503> of an ephah <WH374> for a bullock, <WH6499> and an ephah <WH374> for a ram, <WH352> and an hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> for an ephah. <WH374>

In the seventh <WH7651> month, in the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> shall he do <WH6213> the like in the feast <WH2282> of the seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> according to the sin <WH2403> offering, according to the burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH4503> and according to the meat offering, and according to the oil. <WH8081>
